meta.title: ChainX | Swiss Web3 infrastructure
meta.description: Web3 payments, tokenization and AI agents powered by ChainX and thirdweb.

hero.title: ChainX is the Web3 platform for ambitious teams
hero.subtitle: Deliver Apple-grade Web3 experiences with audited Swiss infrastructure: native payments, programmable tokenization and onchain AI agents.
bulletPoints: Social, email, MPC and 500+ wallets out of the box
AI agents that execute secure onchain flows

stats.title: Trust engineered in Switzerland
stats.description: Resilient infrastructure with certifications for regulated operations.

capabilities.title: The full thirdweb stack, production ready

items.title: Token Studio
items.description: Ship ERC20, ERC721 and ERC1155 with KYC/AML flows, dynamic allowlists and direct sales.

items.title: Checkout & Payments
items.description: Collect USDC or fiat via on-ramps with Apple Pay-level UX, gasless and financial reporting.

items.title: Bridge & Swap
items.description: Instant multi-chain liquidity with intelligent routing and fee coverage for your users.

items.title: AI Agents
items.description: Autonomous agents monitoring onchain data, executing secure flows and alerting your team.

items.title: Compliance & Data
items.description: Regulatory cockpit with MiCA monitoring, FATF reports and real-time historical analytics.

wallet.title: ChainX account ecosystem
wallet.description: Instant onboarding with social identities, MPC wallets and production-ready smart accounts.

items.title: Social & Email login
items.description: Google, Apple, Passkeys and multi-factor validation in a single SDK.

items.title: Smart Accounts
items.description: Sponsor gas, enforce policies and sign with enterprise guardrails every time.

items.title: Wallet orchestration
items.description: Manage over 500 wallets and devices with real-time monitoring.

items.title: Developer console
items.description: Logs, metrics and webhook callbacks for product and support teams.

integrations.title: Integrations & alliances
integrations.description: We plug into the stack trusted by global brands.

items.title: Safe Treasury
items.description: Secured with multi-sig features and ChainX wallets for institutional treasuries.

items.title: King of Destiny
items.description: NFT collection sold out in under two minutes with social onboarding and gasless payments.

items.title: Coinbase IRL
items.description: In-person transactions managed through our multi-chain stack and operational dashboards.

rows.chainx: Social login, MPC and 500+ wallets in one SDK
rows.others: Manual integrations with limited wallet coverage
No native fiat or programmable sales

rows.chainx: Automated multi-chain bridge with fee coverage

Audited Swiss infra, SOC2 and 24/7 support
